channel.title: CISA KEV Catalog Updates
channel.description: This feed notifies when CISA updates the KEV catalog.

item.title: KEV Catalog Updated: 2025-10-06
item.description: CISA updated the KEV catalog on 2025-10-06. This update includes 6 new CVE(s): CVE-2021-22555, CVE-2010-3962, CVE-2021-43226, CVE-2013-3918, CVE-2011-3402, CVE-2010-3765
